titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that both Houses of Congress should reconvene on or before December 18, 2013, to take appropriate action to enact legislation extending the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Program until January 1, 2015.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/16/2013--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that both chambers should reconvene on or before December 18, 2013, to take appropriate action to enact legislation extending the Emergency Unemployment Compensation (EUC) Program until January 1, 2015.
